Kalamazoo.John Gibbs House (Kalamazoo, Michigan):
The John Gibbs House was built in Kalamazoo, Michigan, in 1853. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.


== Description and history ==
The house is located on the south side of Parkview Avenue next to Western Michigan University's Business Technology and Research Park in Kalamazoo, Michigan.
